summary: This document is a brief email notification sent on July 30, 2019, informing a recipient that inmate Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center. It states he faced a Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report and was pending a hearing before a Disciplinary Hearing Officer.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit and appeared before the Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report.

events.title: Epstein moved to Special Housing Unit
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit at the Metropolitan Correctional Center and appeared before the Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (implied from context of Special Housing Unit and Psychological Observation)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was moved from Psychological Observation to the Special Housing Unit on or before July 30, 2019.
Epstein faced a Unit Discipline Committee for a self-mutilation incident report.
He was pending a hearing before a Disciplinary Hearing Officer at the time of this notification.
